name: open-personal-archive-data-model
description: This library contains the types, interfaces, and factory functions for data types specific to the Open Personal Archive™ (OPA) system.
author: Ryan Stephen Ehrenreich

scripts.prebuild: node -p "'export const NAME = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').name) + ';\n' + 'export const VERSION = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').version) + ';\n' + 'export const BUILD_DATE = ' + JSON.stringify((new Date()).toISOString()) + ';'" > src/PackageInfo.ts
scripts.build: cd ../base & npm run build & cd ../datamodel & tsc
